Dataset Name: MTA NYC Transit Turnstile Usage Data
Description:
Weekly released cumulative entrance and exit count of each turnstile for each stations. For each week, there is a CSV formatted text file, with header:
C/A, UNIT, SCP, STATION, LINENAME, DIVISION, DATE, TIME, DESC, ENTRIES, EXITS
Latitude and longitude of subway stations
Projections of the approximations of New York City's Community Districts
